entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • WebSockets over HTTP/2 issues #72301
  • 📢dotnet/runtime schedule for the remainder of .NET 7 #72297
  • net7.0-iOSSimulator-Release-x64-Mono_Release-OSX.1015.Amd64.Open timeout failure #72292
  • 0x800705AF - "The paging file is too small for this operation to complete" in Mono_Release in runtime-extra-platforms #72290
  • Microsoft.Extensions.FileProviders.Physical.Tests Failure on Mono in runtime-extra-platforms #72288
  • AV x64 dotnet.exe on windows arm64 #72284
    7.0.0
  • System.Collections.Immutable.Tests.ImmutableInterlockedTests.UpdateArray_HighConcurrency test failure on tvOs #72282
  • readytorun\coreroot_determinism\coreroot_determinism\coreroot_determinism.cmd test failure #72276
  • JIT: Illegal return buffer/argument aliasing in SysV x64 ABI #72270
    8.0.0
  • [x86] Returning struct from UnmanagedCallersOnly method throws AccessViolationException #72265
    7.0.0
  • HttpClient.SendAsync ignores set Content-Type header in Blazor Web Assembly #72264
  • False positive for `SYSLIB1006` when user haven't specified `EventID` #72263
    Future
  • How to check GC Collection information that does not affect performance. #72247
  • ThreadTests.PriorityTest fails on Linux #72246
  • Event Log message is not shown in the way it is sent #72245
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: XSD DCS Schema API's from 4.8 #72243
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: DataContract API's to enable external Schema Import/Export package #72242
    7.0.0
  • Test failure System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.Tests.RevocationTests.TimeoutTests.AiaFetchDelayed #72240
  • Test failure System.Net.Quic.Tests.MsQuicTests.SetListenerTimeoutWorksWithSmallTimeout #72238
    7.0.0

Closed

  • Application goes to "No symbol loaded" mode and pops up an exception when stop running application #72241
    7.0.0
  • Make it possible to access specific elements of an X500DistinguishedName #33914
    7.0.0
  • Test failure System.Diagnostics.Tests.DiagnosticSourceEventSourceBridgeTests.Stress_WriteConcurrently_DoesntCrash #65984
    7.0.0
  • Test failure BasicEventSourceTests.TestsManifestGeneration.Test_EventSource_EtwManifestGenerationRollover #71243
    7.0.0
  • System.IndexOutOfRangeException when using System.Text.Json 7.0 Preview 5 to do polymorphism serialize/deserialize #71994
    7.0.0
  • Allow skip chain validation in ClientCertificate authentication #40423
    7.0.0
  • SSLStream should support cancelling certificate chain building with cancellation token #35839
    7.0.0
  • RemoteCertificateValidationCallback can not detect some incomplete certificate chains #59944
    7.0.0
  • DisableCertificateDownloads & AIA behaviour #59979
    7.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Buffers.Binary.Tests.BinaryReadAndWriteTests #68338
  • Solution to the "Localized exceptions" problem #46656
    Future
  • [macOS] Potential regression in delegates invocation #59152
    7.0.0
  • Please revert PR #57561 #72220
  • Revisit default Quality used by BrotliStream for CompressionLevel.Optimal #64185
    7.0.0
  • Revisit BrotliStream CompressionLevel values #46595
    7.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'fgReachable(begBlk, endBlk)' during 'Update flow graph opt pass' #64764
    7.0.0
  • ExecutionEngineException is thrown in .net7 WPF app when i EnC #70834
    7.0.0
  • BinaryFormatter exception message text should be clearer when the target project type killbits NRBF serialization #68723
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: property MessageEN in class System.Exception #72277
  • [API Proposal]: string.ToTitleCase() extension method(s) #72269
    Future
  • Provide a DiagnosticSuppressor for diagnostics that guide users to not follow the Custom Marshaller shapes #71793
    7.0.0
  • Exception object should have a non-localized version for exception message #24402
    Future
  • required and GenerateReferenceAssemblySource #71559
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Rename resourceID in PartitionedRateLimiter #72121
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add `Lock()` and `IsLocked` methods to JsonSerializerOptions #72268
  • Add a service configuration pattern, similar to UseStartup<> from IWebHostBuilder #42364
    Future
  • [HTTP/3] Graceful server shutdown and H3_REQUEST_REJECTED #56944
    7.0.0
  • matrix4x4createfromaxisangletest failing on NativeAOT #72149
  • System.ComponentModel.Win32Exception thrown in System.Net.Security.Tests #52361
    Future
  • the conversation in this issue has a link that is no longer valid #72239
  • Test failure System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.HttpClientHandler_RemoteServerTest.SendAsync_RequestVersion20_ResponseVersion20 #71418
    Future
  • document WaitForExitAsync() Stdout/Stderr drain #61728
  • . #72249
  • QUIC: Standardize exception meaning and behavior #55619
    7.0.0
  • [QUIC] Implement better QUIC status code messages #32066
    7.0.0
  • Will loading IJW (mixed C++/CLI) assemblies into a collectible AssemblyLoadContext be supported? #72237
  • [Api Suggestion] Add System.Text.Xml #30718
    Future
  • [wasm] `mono-aot-cross` crashing all `performance` `wasm-aot` jobs #72105
  • [wasm] All `performance` jobs failing due to NRE in `BenchmarkDotNet.Autogenerated.UniqueProgramName.AfterAssemblyLoadingAttached` #72104

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix for older version of cmake #72300
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Add analyzer for validating NativeMarshallingAttribute and parameters of CustomMarshallerAttribute #72299
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 8.0.0
  • Ensure last error is preserved for GCStress #72298
    GCStress, area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Reset ThreadState.Background on stopped threads #72296
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Do not run pipelines on .devcontainer changes #72295
    area-Infrastructure
  • enable OpenSSL tests on arm64 mac #72294
    area-System.Security, os-mac-os-x, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Misc test, and host fixes #72293
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Consolidate importer spilling code #72291
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Disable gcstress for processenvironment test #72289
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Add the GitHub CLI to the Codespaces container #72287
    area-Meta
  • Do not assume return type ABIs match in `RETURN(CALL)` #72285
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Include EventLog.Messages in WindowsDesktop pack #72280
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm] improve startup #72275
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Avoid adding an HttpClient.Timeout message to ConnectTimeout exceptions #72274
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] separate PromiseController<T> from cancellation #72273
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • Bump LLVM packages to 14.x #72272
    NO-MERGE, area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Test "1es-windows-2022-open" for HttpStress and SslStress #72271
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.Net.Http
  • Support OpenSSL-based MsQuic on Windows #72262
    area-System.Net
  • Improve Interop.Sys.ReadLink error handling #72258
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Implement `Stream.HasOverridenBeginEndXXX` #72252
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add clr.aot subset for convenience and document it #72251
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [IGNORE][wasm] Trying `TrimMode=full` #72244
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Make `Enum.GetValues` AOT-safe #72236
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Merged

  • [LoongArch64] add crossgen2 for LoongArch64. #72017
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Fix finalized SafeHandles in System.Security.Cryptography on Linux #72279
    area-System.Security
  • Permit repeating WaitHandle of infinite timeout #72267
    area-System.Threading, 7.0.0
  • Add the ability to iterate the RDNs in an X500DN #72235
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Fix CompressionLevel.Optimal for Brotli #72266
    area-System.IO.Compression, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Fix unsigned indexing with negative value on EnC #72255
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Update Newtonsoft.Json reference in host tests to new version #72286
    test-enhancement, area-Host
  • Delete unused remnants of V1 marshaller shape support #72281
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Fix IndexOutOfRangeException when serializing/deserializing 4+ level deep nested types with polymorphism #72261
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Fix some SafeHandle finalization in System.Net.Security #72189
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Fix loop scaling when removing a block #72134
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix most SafeHandle finalization occurrence in System.Net.Quic #72221
  • Disabling Linux Bionic tests that fail on staging. #72256
    test-bug
  • Differentiate "BinaryFormatter disabled" error messages #72248
    area-System.Runtime, 7.0.0
  • Fixes for NonBacktracking NFA mode #72199
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Review error messages in JSON #72254
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Add diagnostic suppressor for the MarkMethodsAsStatic diagnostics on custom marshallers #72129
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • [RateLimiting] Rename resourceID in PartitionedRateLimiter #72214
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Use a stackalloc for short SHA1 hashes in X509SubjectKeyIdentifierExtension #72216
    area-System.Security
  • Disable caching in find_program #72250
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Add test for receiving H3_REQUEST_REJECTED from server #72253
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Annotating libraries with small number of warnings to be AOT safe #72108
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Tweak SafeHandle finalization logging to include a count #72223
  • Link ignored test back to filed issue #72188
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Enabling 9 new libraries tests for NativeAOT #72167
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Add interop code to the browser template #72172
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Recognize TrimMode=partial in ILCompiler targets #71117
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Update UserTypeMarshallingV2.md to match approved design #72230
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [wasm] Fix perf pipeline builds #72234
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Fix chain cleanup in SslStream.SelectClientCertificate #72222
  • [wasm] + js interop ownership #72215
    area-Interop-coreclr

Updated

  • Make Type.GetTypeCode/IsEnum intrinsics #71685
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Adapt System.CommandLine (v2) in more places #72082
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: teach VN to fold type comparisons #72136
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update runtime repo to use Preview 6 SDK #72145
  • Always use live host #71725
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Added DEBUG switches for roundtrip ILASM #72128
    area-ILTools-coreclr
  • Fix `ldelem[a]/stelem/cpobj/ldobj/stobj <pointer type>` import #71679
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • NativeAOT: Guarded devirtualization #64497
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Zip64ExtraField reads StartDiskNumber as uint32 #62959
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • Properly calculate the ELF unwind info section size #72146
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Implement ICorProfilerInfo13 to support object handle creation/destruction/access #71257
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix System.Number.BigInteger.DivRem outputting an incorrect remainder #72115
    area-System.Numerics
  • [mono] Pass the pending exception correctly from interp_runtime_invok… #72126
    arch-wasm
  • Port the incremental source generator polyfill code to the 6.0 servicing branch. #72219
    6.0.x
  • [PERF][MAUI] Add Maui runs for net7.0 #71979
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • PGO: Add new tiers #70941
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Utilize ProtocolException for HTTP/2 in HttpStress #72034
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Linker to NativeAOT sync #71485
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] reduce legacy interop usage #72021
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • [Mono][Test] Collapse mono runtime tests into single builds using global-build-job template #62863
    area-Infrastructure-mono, needs-author-action
  • Fix debugger funceval deadlock #72179
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Fix incremental XxHash32/XxHash64 #69185
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Add reference assembly for System.Private.CoreLib.dll #72143
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Remove fallback to reflection converter resolution #72228
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • [6.0] Re-create MultiCoreJIT profile data on profile-use-only mode #71754
    Servicing-consider, area-TieredCompilation-coreclr, community-contribution, 6.0.x
  • [DRAFT][MONO] Move marshal-ilgen into a component #71203
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [Android] Fix some System.Net tests #71385
    area-System.Net
  • [wasm] Add `perf-wasm` pipeline #72119
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Tar: restore directory permissions while extracting. #72078
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • #65560 Added FileCreateCaseSensitive for ios/tvos simulators #71948
    area-System.Reflection-mono
  • fixes #71185 #71926
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • [mono] Avoid transformation from multiplication to left shift in case of 64 bit value #71189
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, community-contribution
  • Add lowering support for conditional nodes #71705
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Added support for getting members of static structures. #69542
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Removed duplicated testcases as a follow-up for #70560 #71827
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • JIT: Remove GTF_CALL_M_UNMGD_THISCALL and badcode on thiscall with 0 args #71882
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Port Windows/MSDTC distributed transactions support #72051
    area-System.Transactions
  • Implement DivRem intrinsic for X86 #66551
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Issue71025 test #72154
    area-System.Transactions, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Remove Mono LLVM tools from Darc subscription #72212
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, needs-author-action
  • Add TieredPGO and ReadyToRun to Microsoft-Windows-DotNETRuntime/TieredCompilation/Settings event #72056
    area-VM-coreclr
  • DCS alignment to 4.8 with schema support #71752
    area-Serialization, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Introduce a source generator for invoking methods on unmanaged vtables #68276
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-15
entry.content:
PullRequests

Merged

  • Generate Scratch only if there is cold code #1936

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Advertising manifest messages showing up during install #26626
  • Reenable workload manifest test #26624
  • References with access modifiers #26609

PullRequests

Created

  • Trim response file lines to prevent forwarding along whitespace-only tokens #26627
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Remove unnecessary fields on FirstPartyNuGetPackageSigningVerifier #26623
    Area-Workloads
  • Switch to hosted images to try to avoid the 45 minute timeout #26621
    Area-Infrastructure
  • ApiCompat: Add ValidateAssemblies msbuild task and add global tool #26616
    Area-Compatibility

Merged

  • Allow dotnet workload update print-download-link-only to work with when update available in newer feature band #25669
    Area-Workloads
  • Allow dotnet workload update print-download-link-only to use fallback and work with prior SDK versions #26369
    Servicing-consider, Servicing-approved, Area-Workloads
  • Exclude VS references from source build #26556
    Area-NetSDK

Updated

  • Use the Implicit SDK RID for RID-Specific Apps by Default #26143
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1884396 #26571
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'main' #26500
    Area-Infrastructure
  • MSBuild server V2 #26104
    Area-CLI
  • Migrate dotnet new Cli, dotnet-new3, *.IntegrationTests, *.UnitTests, template_feed to SDK #26521
    Area-Templates

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-15
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • [Proposal] Support ! (not) on bool-returning delegates and method groups #3515

Updated

  • Champion "readonly for locals and parameters" #188
    Backlog
  • Champion "Support extension methods everywhere" #301
    Likely Never
  • [Proposal]: Support default parameter values in lambdas #6051
    Working Set
  • Champion "Discriminated Unions" #113
    Working Set
  • Open issues for `ref` fields #6149
  • Champion: fixed-sized buffers #1314
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • ref fields updates #6285

Merged

  • Remove GC hole from `low-level-struct-improvements.md` #6278
  • Spec `ref` in object initializers #6277

Updated

  • Add lambda/method group defaults proposal #6274
  • Spec forbidding constant numeric patterns on `INumberBase<T>` #6273

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `ref` parameters to `ref struct` types should be `scoped ref` by default #62691
    17.4
  • Consider separating option definition (name, default value) from its storage #62683
    Backlog
  • Bad parser behavior when combining `file`, `partial`, and `record` #62679
    17.4
  • SyntaxProvider in incremental source generators caches a lot of symbols for large solutions #62674
  • Make `IDE0120` (simplify LINQ expression) a suggestion by default #62673
  • .net 6 + ISymbol.GetAttributes returns Attributes without constructor arguments. #62672
  • Roslyn 4.3 API is not backward compatible with Roslyn 4.2 because of ExclamationExclamationToken #62671
  • Cleanup fading options #62666
  • Inheritance margin reports incomplete info #62660
  • Use module initializer in syntax generator #62659

Closed

  • csharp_indent_preprocessor_region=usual_indent vs. preprocessor-disabled code #57416
    Backlog
  • Unused usings not faded #62183
    Backlog
  • New inline rename dialog appearing in multiple split editors #60805
    17.3
  • New rename dialog doesn't always allow Left / Right arrow navigation immediately after starting rename interaction #60117
    17.3
  • New Inline Rename UI should maintain the selection from the editor #60868
    17.3

PullRequests

Created

  • Update SymReader to the latest version #62695
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge main to features/cache-artifacts #62694
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/use-azure-build-machines #62693
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Clean up global options usage in tests #62692
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #62687
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Produce errors for 'partial file record' #62686
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Remove unused parameter #62685
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Generalize RoamingProfileStorageLocation to ClientSettingsStorageLocation #62684
    Area-IDE
  • Move our C# syntax generator over to be an IIncrementalGenerator #62682
    Area-Compilers
  • Allow symbol keys to resolve against error symbols. #62681
    Area-IDE
  • Use the correct option for splitting comments #62680
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Move UseExpressionBodyForLambda to Analyzers layer #62675
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Support renaming multiple symbols in RenameLanguageService #62670
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Merge release/dev17.3 to release/dev17.3-vs-deps #62637
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Use OmniSharp LineFormatting fallback options in more places. #62690
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Remove dependency on Microsoft.VisualStudio.RemoteControl assembly from Features #62655
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to features/cache-artifacts #62689
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/use-azure-build-machines #62688
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Cleanups for our logging helpers #62171
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Add array initialization optimization #62392
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #62676
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to features/cache-artifacts #62678
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/use-azure-build-machines #62677
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • use dnceng images for Correctness_Determinism #62662
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #62667
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to features/cache-artifacts #62669
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/use-azure-build-machines #62668
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Move the option based fading logic to the diagnostic classification t… #62562
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to features/cache-artifacts #62665
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/use-azure-build-machines #62664
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #62663
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Keep selection on rename invocation #62654
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #62656
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to features/cache-artifacts #62658
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/use-azure-build-machines #62657
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Merge release/dev17.3 to release/dev17.3-vs-deps #62696
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • [EnC] Allow renaming methods, properties, events etc. #62364
    Area-Compilers
  • Handle diff3 conflict markers #62391
    Area-Compilers
  • Use the prior cached state for the Razor generator in later runs #62219
    Area-IDE
  • Document Outline Feature #61784
    Area-IDE
  • windows build optimizations #62336
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Support ref field assignment in object initializers #62584
    Area-Compilers
  • Add more telemetry for rename #61370
    Area-IDE
  • Remove Duplicate Custom UI Visualizer Attributes from CLR Types #57828
    Area-Compilers
  • Make sure options in Tools → Options are persisted #62357
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to main #62573
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Add external access for unit test generation #62633
    Area-IDE
  • Run suppressors insofar as there are suppressable errors #62641
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix semantic model to handle ParenthesizedVariableDesignation #54439
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix project based CompletionProvider #61976
    Area-IDE, IDE-IntelliSense

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • OpenAPI convention on route group cannot examine endpoint-specific metadata #42750
  • Provide access to configuring the SecurityStampValidator from IdentityBuilder #42749
  • Error adding Azure AD auth to Blazor Server app #42746
  • Microsoft Default Blazor WASM app not launched in Https configuration #42745
  • Multiple ASP.NET Core OAuth Correlation cookies #42740
    7.0-rc2

Closed

  • Add support for Output Caching #27387
    7.0.0
  • NavManager.NavigateTo(); 404 status code under phone usage #42744
  • The client has disconnected #42739

PullRequests

Created

  • Avoid always setting request body parameter #42748
    feature-openapi, area-web-frameworks
  • Rename ConfigureRouteHandlerJsonOptions to ConfigureHttpJsonOptions #42747
    area-runtime
  • Backport/pr 42384 to release/7.0 preview7 #42741
    area-web-frameworks

Merged

  • HTTP/3: Add end-to-end test for stream and header reuse #42681
    area-runtime, 7.0-rc1
  • Change to summary for IEndpointConventionBuilder.WithName method #42737
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks, 7.0-rc1
  • Uniquify `$(TestPackageRestorePath)` values #42722
    area-infrastructure, area-mvc, feature-templates, 7.0-rc1

Updated

  • refactor : use new `ThrowIf` overload of `ObjectDisposedException` #42613
    area-blazor, community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Improve Default Blazor WebAssembly Loading Experience #42548
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, 7.0-preview7
  • Adding the rest of WebTransport into Kestrel #42097
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview7
  • Log a warning when using an untrusted developer certificate #42621
    area-runtime, 7.0-rc1
  • Allow cancellation of navigation events in Blazor #42638
    area-blazor
  • Introduce per-HealthCheck periodicity #42646
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Support loading OIDC options from configuration #42679
    area-security, area-web-frameworks
  • [Migrated] - Generate Composite Images Redistributable #42506
    area-infrastructure
  • [draft] JavaScript interop via [JSImport] and [JSExport] #41665
    area-blazor, blazor-wasm
  • Remove 'max-age' in 'Cache-Control' Response Header when Location is None ('no-cache'). #42706
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • macOS dev-certs overhaul #42251
    area-commandlinetools, feature-devcerts, blog-candidate
  • Route tooling #42597

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Contentpage is cut off in iOS #8778
  • ContextActions completely inaccessible for blind users on iOS #8775
  • iOS: SwipeView placed in Border doesn't display #8774
  • Placeholder text is not vertically centered on Entry on windows #8770
  • FlyoutHeader does not render properly on ios #8769
  • Issue with Razor Class Library in MAUI while publishing the iOS app #8768
  • Setting IsClippedToBounds to false doesn't appear to work on WinUI #8766
  • Unable to run blazor app on the windows platform #8762
  • Custom CollectionView footer disappears when adding items #8761
  • Not able to rollback to specific maui workload version (6.0.312) #8758
  • 3 dots in menu is in black in dark theme in Windows 10, but white in Windows 11 #8756
  • VoiceOver is reading invisible control. #8754
  • Windows - TextToSpeech.Default.SpeakAsync is not awaited. #8753
    6.0-servicing

Closed

  • Include an option to add a menu item separator. Sometimes menu items need to be logically grouped. #5999
    .NET 7
  • Definitely a bug #8745
  • StackLayout is an ambiguous reference between Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Compatibility.StackLayout and Microsoft.Maui.Controls.StackLayout #3650
  • [Bug] Contribution Build Failing #2307
    6.0-servicing
  • Again problems connecting a Mac. #8759
  • [iOS] Can't remove border from Entry #8755
  • Voiceover reading switch button for radio button. #5818
    6.0-servicing

PullRequests

Created

  • Add Obsolete attribute to MessagingCenter #8765

  • [MacCatalyst] Fix crash using Slider using Mac UIDeviceFamily #8757
    t/bug, platform/macOS 🍏, area/controls 🎮, fatal, control-slider

Merged

  • Implement menu separators #8565
    area/controls 🎮, control-menubar, .NET 7
  • Update xharness / show emulator for local runs #8682
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Drop back down to preview 6 #8773
  • Utilize explicit dimensions for star measurements in non-Fill alignments #8720
  • [VisualDiagnostics] Fix RectangleAdorner with updated math #8728
  • Update some packages #8764
  • Fix the sample build #8751
  • Add [Category] to Essentials tests and use MauiAssets #8748
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/essentials 🍞

Updated

  • Handle null/empty PropertyName in the INPC.PropertyChanged event #8418
    area/controls 🎮
  • More Unpackaged Support #8536
    platform/windows 🪟, area/essentials 🍞, 6.0-servicing
  • [workload] Remove Microsoft.Maui.Dependencies pack #6871
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, .NET 7
  • [xamlc] add compiled BrushTypeConverter #8567
    area/Xaml </>, area/perf 🏎️
  • Fix issue rendering Brushes binding GradientStop colors #7719
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, control-frame, 6.0-sr3
  • Fix CheckBox's VisualStates #8605
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-checkbox, 6.0-servicing
  • Workaround VS Bug with using dotnet 7 workloads #8316
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Exclude `global.json` from iOS Bundle Resources #8724

  • Bump Microsoft.Web.WebView2 from 1.0.1245.22 to 1.0.1264.42 #8550
